name: Butterflies on the cosmic garden - Original Colors
description: "These cyber butterflies get attracted by the radiation emitted from the plants that live in space. Only with Gama filters we can see the true colors of this radiosynthesis feast." || This piece was painted on its oposite colors, like a kodak film that must be developed.  What are the real colors that only the artist could envision? ||  This is the original version of the painting, created on paper using watercolor technique. This exclusive edition is 4203x3058 px, 5.4 MB, painted in 140lb cold pressed cotton paper (8.6x9 inches).
